page.title: 20CHILDREN'S GAMES IN FLITWICK
page.content: DURING THE WEEK 8TH-12TH JULY WOODLAND SCHOOL ORGANISED A{GAMES {PROJECT,}WHICH INVOLVED THE CHILDREN RE-DISCOVERING GAMES OF MANY DIFFERENT KINDS PLAYED BY PARENTS, GRANDPARENTS, AND EVEN GREAT-GRANDPARENTS IN THEIR CHILDHOOD. {POPULARITY OF GAMES PLAYED BY IL. {LARGE GROUP GAMES.} THREE BAD EGGS - FIRST PLACE. HIDE THE HUNTED - SECOND PLACE. 54321 - THIRD PLACE. {SMALL GROUP GAMES} GROUP SKIPPING - FIRST PLACE. GOOD SHOT. - SECOND PLACE. HOPSCOTCH. - THIRD PLACE. {INDIVIDUAL GAMES. STILT WALKING. - FIRST PLACE. FIVE STONES. - SECOND PLACE. TWO BALL. - THIRD PLACE.
